attributes.action: undertake to immediately suspend and remove from the House of Commons all honourable members of the House of Commons who are, on release of honourable members' expenses claims in July 2009, found to have defrauded the taxpayer by abusing the honourable members' expenses claims system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fraud is a criminal offence and any honourable member who is found to have already committed fraud needs immediately to be removed from access to the ability to further defraud the taxpayers of this country pending their appearance in a court of law and imprisonment.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
